issue.title: [Gandiva] remove gandiva helpers library
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3472](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3472). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Gandiva has two native libraries - libgandiva.so and libgandiva_helpers.so - the helpers one is mostly a duplicate and was added to get around unresolved symbols with java/jni. but, this is a hack and needs to be cleaned up.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3472?focusedCommentId=16660368) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2747
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2747>
